title: Goat Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, English
description: An all-vegan cafe with a bright and friendly environment. Serves meals, desserts and smoothies, of which plenty are gluten free and/or raw. All dishes are freshly prepared daily and where possible use locally sourced and organic produce.  A five minute walk from the train or bus station.
